Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 48th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1978...
Injured on 8/7/1983 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/22/1985...
Traded from Ashburn to Boston (FBA) on 4/18/1987 (Going to Ash: 1B J. Tamplin. Going to SHP: P F. Mosqueda, P V. Fermoso)...
Had first career hit on 5/9/1987, off Patrick Twilley (TRO)...
